movie.title: Argo
movie.plot: As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador.

events.title: the US embassy staff in Tehran are taken hostage
six American diplomats are smuggled out of Iran
